author: esammer
msg: - We now block on driver thread start and complain LOUDLY if we can't.

author: esammer
msg: - Allow LifecycleAware methods to throw InterruptedException.

author: esammer
msg: - Added LifecycleController methods that block indefinitely.

author: esammer
msg: - Fixed log messages. SLF4J doesn't do the right thing with log(string, object, throwable). - Fixed a bug (in a really gross way) where we didn't close a sink if a source failed to open. - Improved ChannelDriver unit tests to ensure the number of events from a source match those successfully delivered to the sink. - Added tests for both flakey next and append methods in the source and sink respectively.
